resources.string: Gathering data in digital rain barrels...
LOG IN BELOW WITH YOUR APPCELERATOR.COM CREDENTIALS
Need an account? Get one here >
Oops! There was a problem logging in to your developer account. Please check your e-mail and password and try again.
We were unable to reach our servers to end your session. Please check your network connection and try again.
I don't have any of those...
I already signed up with a new account.
No account? That's cool, sign up here instead...
Already have an account? Sweet, log in here.
It looks like your device is not connected to the internet. Please check your network settings and try again.
We were unable to retrieve session data at this time. Please check your network connection and then press the refresh button to try again.
We were unable to retrieve twitter data at this time. Please check your network connection and then press the refresh button to try again.
